title: My Pixel 4a Bluetooth wont say connected to my car. Drops every 10 mins or so
content:
Just like I've now typed through each of the help options, my pretty much brand new Pixel 4a won't stay connected to the BlueTooth on my care - a VW Golf.

Connects just fine. 
Plays media just fine.
Drops connection every 10 minutes or so.

Surely!!!!

Looks like this is related to the Android 11 problem, though I'm pretty sure it was pre-installed on my phone - build PR1a.201105.002.

Just using BT to connect Audible and music. NOT Android Auto

Any fixes?
